entry.title: Celestial Alegr√≠a's #ReparationsNetwork is live again! in...
entry.content:
Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ Denver

Celestial Alegr√≠a's #ReparationsNetwork is live again! in tandem with the Confronting White Supremacy program that Celestial Alegr√≠a developed & SURJ Denver is facilitating. See below for more information & help spread the wordüôå

Celestial Alegr√≠a

The #CelestialAlegria #ReparationsNetwork is officially relaunching starting this week!

The Reparations Network is a community funded action where together we ...raise $5,000 to offer $500 of reparations to 10 different Black leaders, healers, artists and organizations in our community.

I originally created this program to complement the Confronting Anti-Blackness program for Latinx and Chicanx folks that I run through my business. This fall I will be running the Reparations Network parallel to a Confronting White Supremacy training program I am working on in partnership with Bianca Mikahn and Showing Up for Racial Justice Denver.

Here is how you can take action today:
1. Give any amount via Venmo @Celeste-Martinez-129 or PayPal.Me/CelestialAlegria
2. Share with 5 people you know about this effort!
3. Learn more about #reparations from the platform created by the Movement for Black Lives

#DefendBlackLives #BLM #BlackLivesMatter #BlackLiberation #ConfrontAntiBlackness #BlackAndBrownUnity #Solidarity #RacialJustice #CollectiveCare #Joy #Transformation #Healing #LifeCoach #Organizer #Leader #Trainer #Consultant

See More

entry.title: Two of our friends with Sanctuary4All Colorado need our support!...
entry.content:
Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ Denver

Two of our friends with Sanctuary4All Colorado need our support!

Lupe, who you may have met through solidarity meals, has had a recent cancer diagnosis, which her doctors only found because they were already keeping an eye on a hernia that they were delaying treatment of due to lack of insurance. Now, she is facing two challenging illnesses and is raising funds for medical costs and to support for her family while she recovers. Please consider contributing to her gofundme: https://www.gofundme.com/f/help-lupe-pay-for-cancer-hernia-‚Ä¶

Jeanette Vizguerra , who has been fighting for immigrant rights for decades, and from sanctuary for the last few years, was recently in a horrible car accident. While she recovers with her family, she will be unable to work for some time. If you can, please donate to her directly via Venmo @Sanctuary-4-All!

For the last year, Lupe has been suffering from an abdominal hernia. It‚Äôs be‚Ä¶ Sofia Halpin needs your support for Help Lupe Pay for Cancer & Hernia Treatment

gofundme.com

Help Lupe Pay for Cancer & Hernia Treatment, organized by Sofia Halpin

For the last year, Lupe has been suffering from an abdominal hernia. It‚Äôs be‚Ä¶ Sofia Halpin needs your support for Help Lupe Pay for Cancer & Hernia TreatmentFor the last year, Lupe has been suffering from an abdominal hernia. It‚Äôs be‚Ä¶ Sofia Halpin needs your support for Help Lupe Pay for Cancer & Hernia Treatment

entry.title: Solidarity meals is taking a break for Labor Day, but next...
entry.content:
Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ Denver

Solidarity meals is taking a break for Labor Day, but next weekend we're back with cake and tamales from Yessenia.

Place your orders now!

We hope you enjoy the long weekend! We'll be taking a break too but will be back September 11th with tamales and cake from Yessenia!

entry.title: Sanctuary4All Colorado Solidarity Meals program is moving! ü•≥...
entry.content:
Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ Denver

Sanctuary4All Colorado Solidarity Meals program is moving! ü•≥ "We‚Äôre so grateful to have had the space at the First Unitarian Society of Denver for the last year. This week, we‚Äôre moving up the street to sell the same delicious food at Metro Caring. We‚Äôre so thankful for the space and excited to be working with them." Place your orders TODAY for gorditas from Lupe at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co Pick up your orders at 1100 E. 18th Ave between 1PM and 3PM this Saturday 8/28. Metro Caring is hosting a pop-up market in their parking lot on the same day, come check it out!

entry.title: Spots are going fast for our "Confronting White...
entry.content:
Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ Denver

Spots are going fast for our "Confronting White Supremacy" course that begins in a few weeks! If you're interested in SURJ Denver's 10-week racial justice and political education program in partnership with Celestial Alegr√≠a, please read more here: bit.ly/CWSprogram.

Register now: bit.ly/CWSregistration

If you can't attend, please consider donating -- 100% of funds raised will go to our partner, Celestial Alegr√≠a. Thank you for your generosity.

...

Cohort 1
Mondays, 12:00-2:00 pm
Sep 13 - Nov 15
(10 spots left)

Cohort 2
Tuesdays, 5:00-7:00 pm
Sep 14 - Nov 16
(only 3 spots left)

Commitment: We ask that if you register, that you can make the sessions each week. We know life happens, but this course asks for a commitment of a few hours a week going through the material and having conversations with your cohort. So please check your calendars, and if you know you are going to miss more than 1 week out of 10 weeks, please consider the other day, or wait for our next offering of this course. Thanks for your commitment to this work!

Course Description: This 10 week racial equity and political education training program focuses on how participants can confront their own internalized white supremacy and have access to skills in building relationships of solidarity and accountability with Black, Indigenous and People of Color. Each week participants will receive content prepared by Bianca Mikahn and Celest√© Martinez (Celestial Alegr√≠a), then participate in weekly virtual community gatherings facilitated by the SURJ Denver team.

We'd love for you to join us!

See More

entry.title: Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ DenverCelestial Alegr√≠aAre you a White person who wants to deepen your anti-racist work? Are you a...
entry.content:
Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ DenverCelestial Alegr√≠a

Are you a White person who wants to deepen your anti-racist work? Are you a White person who wants to be a part of a community dedicated to racial justice?

Sig...n up to participate in Confronting White Supremacy with Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ Denver this fall at bit.ly/CWSprogram

This 10 week racial equity and political education training program focuses on how participants can confront their own internalized White Supremacy and have access to skills in building relationships of solidarity and accountability with Black, Indigenous and People of Color. Each week participants will receive content prepared by Bianca Mikahn and Celest√© Martinez, then participate in weekly virtual community gatherings facilitated by the SURJ Denver team.

#ConfrontWhiteSupremacy #DismantleWhiteSupremacy #EndWhiteSupremacy #DefendBlackLives #BLM #BlackLivesMatter #BlackLiberation #IndigenousSovereignty #Solidarity #RacialJustice #AntiRacism #Denver #Colorado #Training #Joy #Transformation #Healing #CelestialAlegria

entry.title: This week Sanctuary4All Colorado is raising money for the First...
entry.content:
Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ Denver

This week Sanctuary4All Colorado is raising money for the First Unitarian Society of Denver, the church that has hosted the Solidarity Meals program for the last year. All of the money raised this week will go toward the church as a thanks for the space provided for the program. Pickup is in Denver at the church, 1400 N. Lafayette Street from 1PM to 3PM. Order your flautas now! https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co

Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

This week we‚Äôre raising money for the First Unitarian Society of Denver, the church that has hosted the Solidarity Meals program for the last year. All of he mo...ney raised this week will go toward the church as a thanks to the space they‚Äôve done graciously offered us. You can order flautas at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co

entry.title: Tania is selling cheese enchiladas this Saturday July 31st with...
entry.content:
Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ Denver

Tania is selling cheese enchiladas this Saturday July 31st with Sanctuary4All Colorado Solidarity Meals! There will also be agua fresca (watermelon water) and dessert available to purchase at pickup. All the funds go directly to impacted families. Pickup is in Denver at 1400 N. Lafayette St. from 1PM to 3PM. Place your orders now! https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co/ Please follow Sanctuary4All Colorado to learn more about how you can support their amazing work.

entry.title: Gaby is selling burritos for $7 this Saturday July 24th with...
entry.content:
Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ Denver

Gaby is selling burritos for $7 this Saturday July 24th with Sanctuary4All Colorado Solidarity Meals! Pickup is in Denver from 1PM to 3PM. All funds will go directly to Gaby and her family. Stock up and place your orders now https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co

De Rajas - A vegetarian burrito filled with peppers, beans & cheese

De Fajitas de Pollo - A chicken burrito filled peppers & cheese

Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Gaby is selling burritos this weekend for $7! Stock up instead of meal prepping. You can order at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co

entry.title: Place your order for this Saturday's Solidarity Meals 7/17...
entry.content:
Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ Denver

Place your order for this Saturday's Solidarity Meals 7/17 - pickup in Denver from 1PM to 3PM with Sanctuary4All Colorado. Yessenia is selling her delicious pupusas AND flan! All of the funds raised go directly to Yessenia and her family who have been fighting their immigration cases since 2011. Place your orders today! https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co.

Frijol con Queso ($3.50) - A thick flatbread made with masa & stuffed with beans & cheese. Served with curtido & salsa roja.
Chicharron con Queso ($3.50) - A thick flatbread made with masa & stuffed with chicharrones & cheese. Served with curtido & salsa roja.
Flan ($5)- A creamy baked custard dessert topped with caramel.

La familia Blanco Mart√≠nez ha estado luchando desde el 2011 con migraci√≥n y hasta la fecha no se define nada a√∫n en su caso, est...amos en resistencia con estas leyes que cambian constantemente es por eso que estamos pidiendo de tu apoyo y aportaci√≥n con comidas solidarias a la familia para seguir luchando con nuestros abogados para poder seguir en este pa√≠s tan bendecido

The Blanco Mart√≠nez family has been fighting ICE since 2011 and still hasn‚Äôt found clarity in their immigration case. We are resisting laws that are constantly changing, which is why we‚Äôre asking for your support and contribution through solidarity meals so that our family can keep fighting alongside our lawyers to be able to stay in this country. We‚Äôre so grateful.

https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co

entry.title: Lupe is selling gorditas and chile Colorado this week for...
entry.content:
Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ Denver

Lupe is selling gorditas and chile Colorado this week for Sanctuary4All Colorado's solidarity meals!

Gorditas are vegetarian (filled with green peppers and cheese) - $15, and chile Colorado is pork in red adobo chile sauce, also $15, both served with a side of rice and beans.

Pickup is ONLY in Denver, this Saturday (July 10th) from 1-3 PM....
Venmo: @guadalupe-carmona-4

Order at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co!

See MoreSanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Guadalupe will be bringing a delicious new dish this Saturday, grab some chile colorado for lunch to support her fight. Order at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co

entry.title: Stop by in solidarity of detained trans migrants and catch a...
entry.content:
Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ Denver

Stop by in solidarity of detained trans migrants and catch a fabulous drag show! Today at 6pm at 19th and Stout.

‚ÄéPadres & J√≥venes Unidos‚Äé to No Pride in Detention: Street Drag Action

üö®HAPPENING TODAYüö® ARE YOU ALL READY TO KICK OFF PRIDE WITH A PROTEST AND DRAG SHOW?! ‚ú®üè≥Ô∏è‚Äçüåà

Join us and in honoring the lives of Roxana, Johana, and Victoria who... died in ICE custody.

We are calling for the release of currently detained trans people & people living with HIV & medical conditions, and to ensure that trans people have the resources to live safely after being released post detention. We demand they have access to safe housing and employment so they can survive and thrive.

THERE IS NOT PRIDE IN DETENTION! ‚úäüèº

Performances by:
‚ú® Regina D Staxx‚ú®
‚ú® Alexis Staxx‚ú®

entry.title: Pablo from Sanctuary4All Colorado is selling Pollo Asada this...
entry.content:
Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ Denver

Pablo from Sanctuary4All Colorado is selling Pollo Asada this Saturday! This delicious roast chicken is served with salad and mashed potatoes. Pickup is in Denver from 1PM-3PM. Please read more about Pablo's story below and show him some support by ordering pollo asada. https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co

Pablo was first detained at the GEO detention center in January of 2020. That summer, he advocated not only for his release but the release of everyone detained due to the... risk of a large COVID outbreak at GEO. His advocacy helped lead to COVID testing for all detainees (the Aurora detention center was one of the first in the country to provide testing), but he also faced retaliation. He was threatened with deportation, thrown in solitary, and eventually moved to Teller county, where he was isolated from his family and community. Pablo was recently released, and is still fighting his deportation case.

Pablo was first detained at the GEO detention center in January of 2020. That summer, he advocated not only for his release but he release of everyone detained ...due to the risk of a large COVID outbreak at GEO. His advocacy helped lead to COVID testing for all detainees (the Aurora detention center was one of the first in the country to provide testing), but he also faced retaliation. He was threatened with deportation, thrown in solitary, and eventually moved to Teller county, where he was isolated from his family and community. Pablo was recently released, and is still fighting his deportation case. You can help support him by ordering pollo asada from him at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co.

entry.title: JOIN US FOR A STREET DRAG ACTION TO #ENDTRANSDETENTION ON JUNE...
entry.content:
Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ Denver

JOIN US FOR A STREET DRAG ACTION TO #ENDTRANSDETENTION ON JUNE 24TH AT 6 PM!!

Come enjoy a street drag show to honor Victoria Arellano, Roxsana Hernandez, and Johana Medina, who are three trans women who died because of ICE negligence.

We are demanding that the Biden administration ensures trans people have the resources to live safely after being released post detention, including access to safe housing and employment so that trans people can survive and thrive.

...

Make a difference this Pride, and join us in celebrating our existence as trans and queer people THURSDAY, JUNE 24TH!

Performances by:

‚ú® Regina D. StaxXx ‚ú®

‚ú® Alexis StaxXx ‚ú®

~~~En Espa√±ol~~~

Ven a disfrutar de un espect√°culo callejero de drag en homenaje a Victoria Arellano, Roxsana Hernandez y Johana Medina, quienes son tres mujeres trans que murieron por negligencia intencional de ICE.

Exigimos que la administraci√≥n de Biden garantice que las personas trans tengan los recursos para vivir de manera segura despu√©s de ser liberadas despu√©s de la detenci√≥n, incluido el acceso a una vivienda y un empleo seguros para que las personas trans puedan sobrevivir y prosperar.

¬°Marca la diferencia en este mes del Orgullo y √∫nete a nosotros para celebrar nuestra existencia como personas trans y cuir EL PR√ìXIMO JUEVES 24 DE JUNIO!

Shows Por:

‚ú® Regina D. StaxXx ‚ú®

‚ú® Alexis StaxXx ‚ú®

See More

THU, JUN 24

No Pride in Detention: Street Drag Action

1961 Stout St, Denver, CO 80202, United StatesCauses ¬∑ 276 people

entry.title: Lupe from Sanctuary4All Colorado is selling gorditas this...
entry.content:
Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ Denver

Lupe from Sanctuary4All Colorado is selling gorditas this Saturday, either vegetarian (de rajas con queso) or pork green chile, both are $14 for 2 gorditas served with rice, beans, curtido, and salsa.

Pickup in Denver & Boulder from 1-3 PM.
Order at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co.
Venmo @guadalupe-carmona-4

...

Lupe was in a car accident while on her way to visit her husband, who is currently detained in Texas and will likely soon be deported. The money raised through gordita sales will go toward supporting her family and getting a new car so that she can continue working.

**100% of proceeds raised go directly back to impacted families**.

See MoreSanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Lupe is selling gorditas this Saturday. She was in a car accident recently while on her way to visit her husband, who is currently detained in Texas and will li...kely soon be deported. The money raised through gordita sales will go toward supporting her family and getting a new car so that she can continue working. You can support by ordering at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co
